title: How do we redeem Cosmic Ashe skin from viewing party?
body:
Hello. I was at the Worlds Final viewing party at Event Cinema (Garden City) tonight and it seemed that no one received Ashe Skin tonight.

It seems that it's same for some other places too


Was the skin code supposed to be in the Swag Bag or on the ticket or something?

Or is there another way to redeem it?

If anyone knows please tell me,

Thanx

replies.body:
Hey guys! Thanks for checking in on this. The skin codes should be emailed out by Event in the next couple of days - it's a digital process rather than a physical skin card!

There are some technical limitations that mean the codes can only be sent out AFTER the viewing - apologies for the confusion, we need to be better about setting expectations here.
So my friend bought 10 tickets online for a bunch of us so getting seats were easier. He only got emailed one skin code. Just confirming was he meant to get 10 codes or just the one?

Hi there, if you've still not received all of your codes, please follow the process [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/dErMsi9w-worlds-2018-viewing-party-still-missing-skin-codes-read-this).
It was fixed a day or so after I left that comment. Thanks!

You were meant to get 10 codes, Achenar and Gehirn are following up on the issue:

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/6jGZAhT1/d/MG48R1ve?comment=0001
Thanx seems like problem solved

I submitted a ticket asking about it but apparently last year they sent out the skins via email a few days after. It’s probably only available to those who ordered tickets online. Anyways, if I find anything, I’ll post it here. Hopefully we all get the skins.
Thanx
Same here :( I feel robbed
ye... i feel the same

No, actually i checked after the games (which were too laggy to watch btw) and we got told that the skin codes didnt exist!

Actually pretty sad.

This is also false advertising.. so...

yeah...

So just confirming: an Event employee said the skin codes didn't exist?

They do, and will be sent out via the email address you used to purchase the tickets within the next week or two (hopefully sooner rather than later).

We fully admit that the communication around the skin codes needs to be improved massively if so many people are coming away thinking they've missed out, which is not what we want people to feel.

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=FO615RxE,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2018-11-04T00:49:56.118+0000)
>
> So just confirming: an Event employee said the skin codes didn't exist?
> 
> They do, and will be sent out via the email address you used to purchase the tickets within the next week or two (hopefully sooner rather than later).
> 
> We fully admit that the communication around the skin codes needs to be improved massively if so many people are coming away thinking they've missed out, which is not what we want people to feel.

Yeah, when i asked the event employee she said that they didnt exist in the first place.

Im not too fussed as of now, because the skins are being distributed digitally, but i think the communication between these two parties needs to be improved. Or, at least tell all the attendants that the skin is not a physical copy, but a digital copy, as most people were expecting a physical copy of the skin.

Anyway, it's all good now. thanks for telling everyone!
Who told you that there are no skin code???

Yeah, happened for me too! Riot explain!
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
We had the same issue... it's unfortunate that such a thing would happen. I feel you buddy!
damn RIOT and their false advertisement
A full year after and never saw the skin. Sigh.

As far as I know, everyone who posted about missing out last year did eventually receive their codes.

Given that it's been so long, I can't guarantee there's anything they can do for you now, but if you submit a ticket to player support along with proof of purchase of the cinema ticket and a brief rundown they may be able to help you.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I bought 2 tickets under 1 cinebuzz account and only received one code I was informed by event cinemas that skin codes were only available to members. From my understanding all information regarding the event said it was for every ticket purchased not ONLY for members so I'm extremely confused

Hey there if you've still not received both of your codes then please follow the process [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/dErMsi9w-worlds-2018-viewing-party-still-missing-skin-codes-read-this).

You were meant to get a code per ticket, not per purchase, Achenar and Gehirn are following up on the issue:

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/6jGZAhT1/d/MG48R1ve?comment=0001
